alert.note: Alert for Adams; Crawford; Grant; Juneau; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 10:10PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Spreading In, Hazardous Travel Developing Overnight... .Snow is moving north, northeast across northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin late this evening, and will spread north of Interstate 90 overnight. Roads will quickly become snow covered and slippery after onset of the snow with visibilities falling under 1 mile at times. By the Tuesday morning commute, 1 to 2 inch per hour snowfall rates are likely across parts of northeast Iowa and southwest into central Wisconsin. Early morning motorists should be prepared for slippery to hazardous travel, especially south of Interstate 90. The snow persists into Tuesday afternoon, gradually shifting east of the Mississippi River by the evening. The bulk of the accumulating snow will then exit into eastern Wisconsin by midnight Tuesday. In addition, northwest winds will increase with gusts 30 to 40 mph at times Tuesday afternoon into Tuesday night. This will result in blowing and drifting snow, especially across unsheltered areas and along ridgetops. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with accumulations of 8 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Iowa and central and southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
